para.para: Header file of SDMMC HAL module.

listitem.para: Checks whether the specified SDIO flag is set or not.
Checks whether the specified SDIO interrupt has occurred or not.
Clears the SDIO's interrupt pending bits.
Enable Start the SD I/O Read Wait operation.
Disable Start the SD I/O Read Wait operations.
Enable Start the SD I/O Read Wait operation.
Disable Stop the SD I/O Read Wait operations.
Enable the SD I/O Mode Operation.
Disable the SD I/O Mode Operation.
Enable the SD I/O Suspend command sending.
Disable the SD I/O Suspend command sending.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Header file of SDMMC HAL module.
